content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5,24.5)
A complete and operational power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0,24.5) with coal fuel, currently working
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5), currently working
- Multiple electric poles connecting the system
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler and boiler to steam engine
The system is fully operational producing power with proper fluid flow

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position(0,0)
Two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0) with coal fuel, actively smelting iron ore
- Stone furnace at position(2,0) with coal fuel, actively smelting iron ore
Both furnaces are operational and producing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production at Position(4,4)
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) with coal fuel, actively smelting copper ore

### Research Facility
- Lab containing automation science packs
- Connected to power grid and previously completed automation research

### Automated Iron Gear Wheel Factory at Position(9.5,11.5)
Complete automation setup consisting of:
- Assembling machine at position(9.5,11.5) set to craft iron gear wheels
- Input burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5)
- Output burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5)
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5,11.5) storing iron plates
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5,11.5) collecting produced gear wheels
The system is operational and automatically producing iron gear wheels

# ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities
- Check for terrain compatibility when placing entities
- Verify there are no existing entities blocking placement location

### Resource Management
- Monitor and replenish resource levels (iron ore, copper ore, coal) before they run out
- Keep track of coal levels in burner inserters and furnaces
- Maintain adequate raw materials in input chests for automated assembly

### API Usage Errors
- Building dimensions should be accessed through proper API methods, not direct attribute access
- Use proper Position objects for coordinates
- Handle research state properly - check if technology is already researched

### Recipe and Technology Requirements
- Verify recipe requirements before attempting to craft items
- Ensure proper ingredient quantities are available for automated assembly
- Check technology prerequisites before attempting research

### Automation System Setup
- Ensure proper inserter directions for input/output operations
- Balance input resource supply with production capacity
- Monitor output storage capacity to prevent backup
